data.title: 'Help the Robot' Pathfinding Project
data.text: Develop an intelligent agent that navigates a topographic map to find an optimal path from a starting point to a destination using various search algorithms.

data.title: Graph Algorithms - K-Shortest Loopless Paths
data.text: Efficiently finding the K-shortest loopless paths in a directed graph from a source to a destination vertex.
